mapper.update: update pf_sku_agent set sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agent_level_id = #{agentLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, sku_id, agent_level_id, discount, quantity, remark from pf_sku_agent
